loading_screen_quotes.title: Quest Reward - The Tomb Blade of Arkhan

description.last_approved_text: Fashioned into the shape of a striking asp, the staff writhes and spits with the spiteful anger of Asaph, Goddess of Vengeance.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Fashioned into the shape of a striking asp, the staff writhes and spits with the spiteful anger of Asaph, Goddess of Vengeance.

description.last_approved_text: Over many battles and countless acts of treachery, Chieftain Tretch Craventail of Clan Rictus has proven himself a master of guile.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Over many battles and countless acts of treachery, Chieftain Tretch Craventail of Clan Rictus has proven himself a master of guile.

description.last_approved_text: When the souls are released, they endeavour not to return without new victims to torment for eternity.

loading_screen_quotes.description: When the souls are released, they endeavour not to return without new victims to torment for eternity.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Casket of Souls

description.last_approved_text: What’s scarier than being bombarded with skulls from a distance? Why, if they are on fire and screaming in anguish of course!

loading_screen_quotes.description: What’s scarier than being bombarded with skulls from a distance? Why, if they are on fire and screaming in anguish of course!
loading_screen_quotes.title: Screaming Skull Catapult

description.last_approved_text: Each serpentine steed is spurred to acts of great brutality in the name of the king.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Each serpentine steed is spurred to acts of great brutality in the name of the king.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Necropolis Knights

description.last_approved_text: Tethered to their mounts by a sharp hook, the other mummified hand wields a barbed staff to carve through mortal flesh.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Tethered to their mounts by a sharp hook, the other mummified hand wields a barbed staff to carve through mortal flesh.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Necropolis Knights (Halberds)

description.last_approved_text: Skeletal steeds instinctively obey the will of their riders, displaying the same supernatural discipline.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Skeletal steeds instinctively obey the will of their riders, displaying the same supernatural discipline.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Nehekhara Horsemen

description.last_approved_text: Amidst a churning cloud of heaved-up sand, these Undead warriors charge their foes with supernatural determination.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Amidst a churning cloud of heaved-up sand, these Undead warriors charge their foes with supernatural determination.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Skeleton Horsemen

description.last_approved_text: These riders never tire and can chase foes down over countless leagues, until their dying moment.

loading_screen_quotes.description: These riders never tire and can chase foes down over countless leagues, until their dying moment.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Skeleton Horsemen Archers

description.last_approved_text: Arkhan the Black is the first and most loyal of the evil Nagash's followers. Arkhan helped lead the coup which brought the arch-necromancer to power, and he was the first, after his lord, to imbibe the Elixir of Life.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Arkhan the Black is the first and most loyal of the evil Nagash's followers. Arkhan helped lead the coup which brought the arch-necromancer to power, and he was the first, after his lord, to imbibe the Elixir of Life.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Arkhan the Black

description.last_approved_text: Khalida Neferher, the Warrior-Queen of Lybaras, is highly respected across all the lands of Nehekhara. Her intelligence and bravery are as legendary as her intense sense of honour and justice.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Khalida Neferher, the Warrior-Queen of Lybaras, is highly respected across all the lands of Nehekhara. Her intelligence and bravery are as legendary as her intense sense of honour and justice.
loading_screen_quotes.title: High Queen Khalida

description.last_approved_text: Khatep is the Grand Hierophant of Khemri, the head of the Mortuary Cult's hieratic council, and he alone knows all its secrets and unwritten lore. Khatep is the oldest and wisest of all the Liche Priests and the first member of their order to truly deny death's embrace, if not the ravages of time.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Khatep is the Grand Hierophant of Khemri, the head of the Mortuary Cult's hieratic council, and he alone knows all its secrets and unwritten lore. Khatep is the oldest and wisest of all the Liche Priests and the first member of their order to truly deny death's embrace, if not the ravages of time.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Grand Hierophant Khatep

description.last_approved_text: Settra the Imperishable is the King of all Tomb Kings. He is a ruthless leader whose thirst for conquest knows no bounds. Settra's power is far greater than any other Tomb King, and his unyielding will is such that he never needs to return to his sarcophagus to rest.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Settra the Imperishable is the King of all Tomb Kings. He is a ruthless leader whose thirst for conquest knows no bounds. Settra's power is far greater than any other Tomb King, and his unyielding will is such that he never needs to return to his sarcophagus to rest.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Settra

description.last_approved_text: Crypt Ghouls are barely sentient but they can fight, using their claws and makeshift weapons to rip men apart.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Crypt Ghouls are barely sentient but they can fight, using their claws and makeshift weapons to rip men apart.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Crypt Ghouls

description.last_approved_text: The Warriors of Nehekhara remember only their duty to their king, and pursue his enemies with ruthless purpose.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The Warriors of Nehekhara remember only their duty to their king, and pursue his enemies with ruthless purpose.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Nehekhara Warriors

description.last_approved_text: These desiccated husks remember how to shoot; a hail of endless death to thin the foe's numbers.

loading_screen_quotes.description: These desiccated husks remember how to shoot; a hail of endless death to thin the foe's numbers.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Skeleton Archers

description.last_approved_text: Spears extend, like gnarled and sharpened bones, held firmly in place by their deathly-grip.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Spears extend, like gnarled and sharpened bones, held firmly in place by their deathly-grip.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Skeleton Spearmen

description.last_approved_text: The Undead devotees of the Tomb Kings are risen again, unswervingly loyal to their liege.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The Undead devotees of the Tomb Kings are risen again, unswervingly loyal to their liege.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Skeleton Warriors

description.last_approved_text: These guards' loyalty in life was rewarded; now they are expected to show it once more.

loading_screen_quotes.description: These guards' loyalty in life was rewarded; now they are expected to show it once more.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Tomb Guard

description.last_approved_text: Their great weapons are wielded as expertly as they did in life, slaying for Lord and glory!

loading_screen_quotes.description: Their great weapons are wielded as expertly as they did in life, slaying for Lord and glory!
loading_screen_quotes.title: Tomb Guard (Great Weapons)

description.last_approved_text: "The Carrion of the Desert, whose mighty outstretched wings darken the sun on the day of slaughter."

loading_screen_quotes.description: "The Carrion of the Desert, whose mighty outstretched wings darken the sun on the day of slaughter."
loading_screen_quotes.title: Carrion

description.last_approved_text: A pack of Dire Wolves is a lacerating mess of teeth in the melee, effective against enemy infantry.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A pack of Dire Wolves is a lacerating mess of teeth in the melee, effective against enemy infantry.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Dire Wolves

description.last_approved_text: Fell Bats fall upon their enemies in a seething mass; in numbers, they become overwhelming.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Fell Bats fall upon their enemies in a seething mass; in numbers, they become overwhelming.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Fell Bats

description.last_approved_text: Death's true face radiates sinister magic; the cruel laughter of ancient gods echoes within its shadow.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Death's true face radiates sinister magic; the cruel laughter of ancient gods echoes within its shadow.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Hierotitan

description.last_approved_text: The living are scythed down as these nightmarish beasts glide and bound amongst their helpless, terrified prey.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The living are scythed down as these nightmarish beasts glide and bound amongst their helpless, terrified prey.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Necrosphinx

description.last_approved_text: These sentinels mark the borders of the Tomb Kings' realm, submerged in the sand, waiting to strike at the unsuspecting.

loading_screen_quotes.description: These sentinels mark the borders of the Tomb Kings' realm, submerged in the sand, waiting to strike at the unsuspecting.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Sepulchral Stalkers

description.last_approved_text: They can burrow for leagues when summoned, bursting into battle with a blast of sand and snapping limbs.

loading_screen_quotes.description: They can burrow for leagues when summoned, bursting into battle with a blast of sand and snapping limbs.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Tomb Scorpion

description.last_approved_text: The physical embodiment of the everlasting gods; curse ye all men who look upon their divine forms!

loading_screen_quotes.description: The physical embodiment of the everlasting gods; curse ye all men who look upon their divine forms!
loading_screen_quotes.title: Ushabti

description.last_approved_text: Tremble at their imposing sight, run in vain from their mighty arrows.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Tremble at their imposing sight, run in vain from their mighty arrows.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Ushabti (Great Bow)

description.last_approved_text: A monolithic force of destruction on the battlefield - each tremendous footstep crushing many foolish warriors underfoot.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A monolithic force of destruction on the battlefield - each tremendous footstep crushing many foolish warriors underfoot.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Khemrian Warsphinx

description.last_approved_text: An unearthly mixture of wood, metal and bone to savage the foe in rending, powerful strikes.

loading_screen_quotes.description: An unearthly mixture of wood, metal and bone to savage the foe in rending, powerful strikes.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Skeleton Archer Chariot

description.last_approved_text: From the chariot's elevated platform, archers are offered unparalleled opportunities to fire on the enemy.

loading_screen_quotes.description: From the chariot's elevated platform, archers are offered unparalleled opportunities to fire on the enemy.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Skeleton Chariot

description.last_approved_text: The trebuchet - far superior to the catapult - hurls thrice-blessed stones at the enemy, crushing them with devout fury.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The trebuchet - far superior to the catapult - hurls thrice-blessed stones at the enemy, crushing them with devout fury.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Blessed Field Trebuchet

description.last_approved_text: Walls are nothing to the blast of Trebuchet fire, and a man's skull fares even worse.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Walls are nothing to the blast of Trebuchet fire, and a man's skull fares even worse.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Field Trebuchet

description.last_approved_text: The holy relics of the Lady, the most sacred in all Bretonnia, are guarded by the most fervent and fearsome of warriors.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The holy relics of the Lady, the most sacred in all Bretonnia, are guarded by the most fervent and fearsome of warriors.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Grail Guardians

description.last_approved_text: The Grail Knights charge the enemy line with a furious stampede of hooves and the Lady in their thoughts.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The Grail Knights charge the enemy line with a furious stampede of hooves and the Lady in their thoughts.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Grail Knights

description.last_approved_text: The most junior of Knights, they fight determinedly to make a name for themselves.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The most junior of Knights, they fight determinedly to make a name for themselves.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Knights Errant

description.last_approved_text: The Knights ride down their enemies with a thunderous charge and a cry of valour.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The Knights ride down their enemies with a thunderous charge and a cry of valour.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Knights of the Realm

description.last_approved_text: Archery from horseback is fast and dangerous to the enemy, who have little time to react.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Archery from horseback is fast and dangerous to the enemy, who have little time to react.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Mounted Yeomen Archers

description.last_approved_text: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, the Pegasus Knight swoops across the battlefield with a powerful airborne charge.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, the Pegasus Knight swoops across the battlefield with a powerful airborne charge.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Pegasus Knights

description.last_approved_text: He who undertakes the quest must never flinch and never waver, until at last he finds the sacred Grail, and sups.

loading_screen_quotes.description: He who undertakes the quest must never flinch and never waver, until at last he finds the sacred Grail, and sups.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Questing Knights

description.last_approved_text: A hippogryph is no easy prize, but its power in battle makes the effort to tame one worth it.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A hippogryph is no easy prize, but its power in battle makes the effort to tame one worth it.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Royal Hippogryph Knights

description.last_approved_text: The rarest of all steeds, only the most noble of Bretonnians ride these dignified, sophisticated creatures into battle.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The rarest of all steeds, only the most noble of Bretonnians ride these dignified, sophisticated creatures into battle.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Royal Pegasus Knights

description.last_approved_text: The holder of secrets and keeper of the way, whose strength is the quester's ultimate test.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The holder of secrets and keeper of the way, whose strength is the quester's ultimate test.
loading_screen_quotes.title: The Green Knight

description.last_approved_text: Although a fierce foe to Bretonnia's enemies, Knights should be wary of their kleptomaniac tendencies…

loading_screen_quotes.description: Although a fierce foe to Bretonnia's enemies, Knights should be wary of their kleptomaniac tendencies…
loading_screen_quotes.title: Battle Pilgrims

description.last_approved_text: Every Squire dreams of becoming a Knight, and every Knight dreams of having a better Squire…

loading_screen_quotes.description: Every Squire dreams of becoming a Knight, and every Knight dreams of having a better Squire…
loading_screen_quotes.title: Foot Squires

description.last_approved_text: The interred remains of Knights are defended violently by those whose existence gives them purpose.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The interred remains of Knights are defended violently by those whose existence gives them purpose.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Grail Reliquae

description.last_approved_text: Although Bretonnian warriors are not particularly skilful they can defend a Lord's lands well enough.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Although Bretonnian warriors are not particularly skilful they can defend a Lord's lands well enough.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Men-at-Arms (Polearms)

description.last_approved_text: Though not noble or powerful like Knights, these men take great honour to take up arms in defence of home.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Though not noble or powerful like Knights, these men take great honour to take up arms in defence of home.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Men-at-Arms

description.last_approved_text: Though not noble or powerful like Knights, these men take great honour to take up arms in defence of home.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Though not noble or powerful like Knights, these men take great honour to take up arms in defence of home.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Men-at-Arms (Shields)

description.last_approved_text: Although inaccurate, Peasant Bowmen provide a cheap, plentiful line of defence against the oncoming enemy.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Although inaccurate, Peasant Bowmen provide a cheap, plentiful line of defence against the oncoming enemy.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Peasant Bowmen

description.last_approved_text: The flame of the Lady goes with this arrow, and so too the low-born archer before long…

loading_screen_quotes.description: The flame of the Lady goes with this arrow, and so too the low-born archer before long…
loading_screen_quotes.title: Peasant Bowmen (Fire Arrows)

description.last_approved_text: Let poisoned arrows fly, and by blessed grace find their mark, though the bowmen may never know why.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Let poisoned arrows fly, and by blessed grace find their mark, though the bowmen may never know why.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Peasant Bowmen (Pox Arrows)

description.last_approved_text: "Rejoice! For a Knight of Bretonnia provides your shield…"

loading_screen_quotes.description: "Rejoice! For a Knight of Bretonnia provides your shield…"
loading_screen_quotes.title: Peasant Mob

description.last_approved_text: With a spear in hand, these men are no heroes, but they are stalwart defenders of their Lord's lands.

loading_screen_quotes.description: With a spear in hand, these men are no heroes, but they are stalwart defenders of their Lord's lands.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Spearmen-at-Arms (Shields)

description.last_approved_text: Put a spear in a man's hand and tell him to brace and he will. He will also hope, and pray.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Put a spear in a man's hand and tell him to brace and he will. He will also hope, and pray.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Spearmen-at-Arms

description.last_approved_text: Though temperamental, a successful Razorgor Chariot charge causes horrendous damage to the enemy line.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Though temperamental, a successful Razorgor Chariot charge causes horrendous damage to the enemy line.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Razorgor Chariot

description.last_approved_text: The strongest, meanest Beastmen, Bestigors seek out elite foes to slaughter and dominate.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The strongest, meanest Beastmen, Bestigors seek out elite foes to slaughter and dominate.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Bestigor Herd

description.last_approved_text: Hybrid man-beasts, raging at fate, Centigors bring their anger to bear upon anything in their path.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Hybrid man-beasts, raging at fate, Centigors bring their anger to bear upon anything in their path.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Centigors

description.last_approved_text: A pack of Chaos Warhounds charging, full of bloodlust and with jaws wide, creates no purer sense of terror.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A pack of Chaos Warhounds charging, full of bloodlust and with jaws wide, creates no purer sense of terror.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Chaos Warhounds

description.last_approved_text: Plagued by visions, Cygors are cursed to see the Winds of Chaos. Naturally, this makes them mad and extremely dangerous.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Plagued by visions, Cygors are cursed to see the Winds of Chaos. Naturally, this makes them mad and extremely dangerous.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Cygor

description.last_approved_text: Gors may be rank-and-file beasts, but that does not diminish their ferocity on the battlefield.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Gors may be rank-and-file beasts, but that does not diminish their ferocity on the battlefield.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Gor Herd

description.last_approved_text: Victims find out too late that the enchanting creature gliding towards them is not a woman, but a savage, rabid beast!

loading_screen_quotes.description: Victims find out too late that the enchanting creature gliding towards them is not a woman, but a savage, rabid beast!
loading_screen_quotes.title: Harpies

description.last_approved_text: A ferocious hunger drives axe-wielding Minotaurs into the melee - hunger for war and hunger for flesh.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A ferocious hunger drives axe-wielding Minotaurs into the melee - hunger for war and hunger for flesh.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Minotaurs

description.last_approved_text: A ferocious hunger drives axe-wielding Minotaurs into the melee - hunger for war and hunger for flesh.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A ferocious hunger drives axe-wielding Minotaurs into the melee - hunger for war and hunger for flesh.

description.last_approved_text: Hideously mutated and filled with hungry rage, Razorgors tear men apart in their search for food.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Hideously mutated and filled with hungry rage, Razorgors tear men apart in their search for food.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Razorgor Herd

description.last_approved_text: Though mocked by stronger beasts, Ungors nevertheless instil fear as they charge the foe down.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Though mocked by stronger beasts, Ungors nevertheless instil fear as they charge the foe down.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Ungor Herd

description.last_approved_text: Although diminutive by Beastmen standards, Ungors are both faster and more nimble than others of their kind.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Although diminutive by Beastmen standards, Ungors are both faster and more nimble than others of their kind.

description.last_approved_text: An eldritch horror, the mad thrashing of its unnatural limbs sends all to their doom.

loading_screen_quotes.description: An eldritch horror, the mad thrashing of its unnatural limbs sends all to their doom.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Chaos Spawn

description.last_approved_text: Giants attack the enemy in a rage, with flailing limbs that break both man and machine apart.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Giants attack the enemy in a rage, with flailing limbs that break both man and machine apart.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Giant

description.last_approved_text: The Hellcannon artillery has a deadly sentience, firing bolts of eldritch fury over great distances.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The Hellcannon artillery has a deadly sentience, firing bolts of eldritch fury over great distances.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Hellcannon

description.last_approved_text: A Chaos Chariot is a terrifying thing to slam into an enemy line, punching through with maddening strength.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A Chaos Chariot is a terrifying thing to slam into an enemy line, punching through with maddening strength.

description.last_approved_text: Chaos Knights deliver a terrifyingly powerful charge to enemy lines, particularly if armed with a lance.

description.last_approved_text: High Magic is far more versatile than other lores as it uses the combined Winds, which is why only Elves and higher lifeforms can cast it. The spells are a powerful mix of defence, support and attack.

loading_screen_quotes.description: High Magic is far more versatile than other lores as it uses the combined Winds, which is why only Elves and higher lifeforms can cast it. The spells are a powerful mix of defence, support and attack.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Lore of High Magic

description.last_approved_text: Life and nature are inextricably linked, when not corrupted by the venomous tendrils of eternal darkness. Life magic is therefore focused on healing and regeneration; the followers of Ghyran use their powers to heal rifts and mend that which is broken, slowing the advancing tide of Chaotic madness and death.

Life magic is therefore focused on healing and regeneration; the followers of Ghyran use their powers to heal rifts and mend that which is broken, slowing the advancing tide of Chaotic madness and death.

description.last_approved_text: The Lore of Light can broadly be described as protective magic, granting defensive bonuses to your troops. This is why it is also known as Guardian Magic, and why White Wizards are so sought after by canny generals.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The Lore of Light can broadly be described as protective magic, granting defensive bonuses to your troops. This is why it is also known as Guardian Magic, and why White Wizards are so sought after by canny generals.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Lore of Light

description.last_approved_text: The Lore of Metal is based around the manipulation and transformation of metals. As you might expect, enemies that rely heavily on armour should beware the Lore of Metal, as its spells either ignore armour or turn it against its wearer, with horrendous consequences.

description.last_approved_text: The Lore of Shadows embodies unease and confusion, an ethereal misdirection that leaves victims disorientated and deeply unsettled. Those affected by the “thick grey fog” feel displaced, clumsy, or as if the weight of a thousand unknown burdens lies heavily upon their shoulders.

description.last_approved_text: The Lore of the Wild can wreck terrible devastation on the foe by turning creatures against their handlers. It contains an array of hexes, as well as the ability to summon forth the most monstrous of beasts from the deepest forest enclaves.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The Lore of the Wild can wreck terrible devastation on the foe by turning creatures against their handlers. It contains an array of hexes, as well as the ability to summon forth the most monstrous of beasts from the deepest forest enclaves.

description.last_approved_text: The Lore of Vampires is a form of Dark Magic that focuses on the dread art of Necromancy. Spells in this lore can improve and refresh the Undead legions or hex the foe with lashes of dark energy and fell winds.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The Lore of Vampires is a form of Dark Magic that focuses on the dread art of Necromancy. Spells in this lore can improve and refresh the Undead legions or hex the foe with lashes of dark energy and fell winds.

description.last_approved_text: Preferred lore of Plague Priests, the Spells of Plague are a vile selection that can hurt a lot of the enemy at once. Perfect for when you’re facing hordes of lightly-armoured troops.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Preferred lore of Plague Priests, the Spells of Plague are a vile selection that can hurt a lot of the enemy at once. Perfect for when you’re facing hordes of lightly-armoured troops.

description.last_approved_text: The Spells of Ruin are a fell mix of harrowing offensive attacks, short-range relocation for 'brave' withdrawals, and augments that can rile your own warriors into a deadly frenzy.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The Spells of Ruin are a fell mix of harrowing offensive attacks, short-range relocation for 'brave' withdrawals, and augments that can rile your own warriors into a deadly frenzy.

bulletpoints.last_approved_text: 1. Spell Upgrade: whether a spell is selected or upgraded.||2. Power: the amount of power that can be used at one time.||3. Power Reserve: As power reserves deplete, the recharge rate decreases.||4. Recharge Rate: the speed at which magical power regenerates.

loading_screen_quotes.bulletpoints: 1. Spell Upgrade: whether a spell is selected or upgraded.||2. Power: the amount of power that can be used at one time.||3. Power Reserve: As power reserves deplete, the recharge rate decreases.||4. Recharge Rate: the speed at which magical power regenerates.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Winds of Magic

description.last_approved_text: Fired from a catapult with crude wings strapped to his arms, the cackling Goblin pilot guides himself to a messy, pointy-hatted impact.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Fired from a catapult with crude wings strapped to his arms, the cackling Goblin pilot guides himself to a messy, pointy-hatted impact.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Doomdiver Catapult

description.last_approved_text: Atop their venomous mounts, Goblin Riders can run down enemies with surprising precision.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Atop their venomous mounts, Goblin Riders can run down enemies with surprising precision.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Forest Goblin Spider Rider Archers

description.last_approved_text: Chariots deliver explosive charges to the front lines; the wolf steeds that draw them are ferocious in battle.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Chariots deliver explosive charges to the front lines; the wolf steeds that draw them are ferocious in battle.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Goblin Wolf Chariot

description.last_approved_text: A pack of Wolf Riders can appear from nowhere, strike with precision, and be away before the enemy knows what has happened.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A pack of Wolf Riders can appear from nowhere, strike with precision, and be away before the enemy knows what has happened.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Goblin Wolf Riders

description.last_approved_text: Prideful - and all the more deadly for it - the Boar Boyz deal grizzly death from atop their mounts.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Prideful - and all the more deadly for it - the Boar Boyz deal grizzly death from atop their mounts.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Orc Boar Boyz

description.last_approved_text: It takes a certain kind of insanity to ride a rage-frothed Squig and bounce into the fray.

loading_screen_quotes.description: It takes a certain kind of insanity to ride a rage-frothed Squig and bounce into the fray.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Night Goblin Squig Hoppers

description.last_approved_text: Black Orcs are more disciplined, armoured and deadly than other Orcs, ripping through enemies with their heavy weapons for fun.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Black Orcs are more disciplined, armoured and deadly than other Orcs, ripping through enemies with their heavy weapons for fun.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Black Orcs

description.last_approved_text: Goblin Archers can pepper the enemy from afar, with varying success.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Goblin Archers can pepper the enemy from afar, with varying success.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Goblin Archers

description.last_approved_text: The spear is a solid weapon; piercing and defensive. Goblins, however…

loading_screen_quotes.description: The spear is a solid weapon; piercing and defensive. Goblins, however…
loading_screen_quotes.title: Goblins

description.last_approved_text: Even the most heinous green-skinned scumbags look upon these Goblins' swift skulduggery with reverent horror.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Even the most heinous green-skinned scumbags look upon these Goblins' swift skulduggery with reverent horror.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Nasty Skulkers

description.last_approved_text: Raining arrows from a distance is the preferred Greenskin tactic.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Raining arrows from a distance is the preferred Greenskin tactic.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Night Goblin Archers

description.last_approved_text: Night Goblins raid with efficiency; they swarm and ambush, cutting their foes apart.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Night Goblins raid with efficiency; they swarm and ambush, cutting their foes apart.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Night Goblins

description.last_approved_text: From afar, Arrer Boyz rain down arrows upon their enemies. Accuracy be damned, quantity is all.

loading_screen_quotes.description: From afar, Arrer Boyz rain down arrows upon their enemies. Accuracy be damned, quantity is all.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Orc Arrer Boyz

description.last_approved_text: The hardest-hitting mobs in a tribe, Big 'Uns are well placed in melee, where they happily smash their enemies apart.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The hardest-hitting mobs in a tribe, Big 'Uns are well placed in melee, where they happily smash their enemies apart.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Orc Big 'Uns

description.last_approved_text: Orc Boyz lack the strength of Big 'Uns, but their tenacity and endurance in battle is well respected.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Orc Boyz lack the strength of Big 'Uns, but their tenacity and endurance in battle is well respected.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Orc Boyz

description.last_approved_text: Savage Orcs lay into their enemies with clubs, axes or whatever is needed to cause as much damage as possible.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Savage Orcs lay into their enemies with clubs, axes or whatever is needed to cause as much damage as possible.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Savage Orcs

description.last_approved_text: One incensed Squig is enough trouble. For whosoever attracts their ire, an entire herd conjures a nightmare!

loading_screen_quotes.description: One incensed Squig is enough trouble. For whosoever attracts their ire, an entire herd conjures a nightmare!
loading_screen_quotes.title: Night Goblin Squig Herd

description.last_approved_text: With a team of Goblin riders upon its back, the Arachnarok's sheer enormity strikes fear into the hearts of all who face it.

loading_screen_quotes.description: With a team of Goblin riders upon its back, the Arachnarok's sheer enormity strikes fear into the hearts of all who face it.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Arachnarok Spider

description.last_approved_text: A lumbering Giant is the terror of the battlefield, smashing entire ranks of men aside and feasting on the less fortunate ones.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A lumbering Giant is the terror of the battlefield, smashing entire ranks of men aside and feasting on the less fortunate ones.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Giant

description.last_approved_text: Up close, a Troll will batter foes into submission, or vomit disgusting, and potentially corrosive, bile across the field.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Up close, a Troll will batter foes into submission, or vomit disgusting, and potentially corrosive, bile across the field.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Trolls

description.last_approved_text: The High Elves' chief artillery piece can mow down infantry and pierce Giants' hearts.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The High Elves' chief artillery piece can mow down infantry and pierce Giants' hearts.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Eagle Claw Bolt Thrower

description.last_approved_text: The weight of their ancestry is carried with them, skewering all-comers on their bloody lances.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The weight of their ancestry is carried with them, skewering all-comers on their bloody lances.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Dragon Princes

description.last_approved_text: Favoured by Caledor, these raiders bring oblivion to Ulthuan's enemies, by spear-tipped charge.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Favoured by Caledor, these raiders bring oblivion to Ulthuan's enemies, by spear-tipped charge.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Ellyrian Reavers

description.last_approved_text: These archers take aim at the enemies of the Elven kingdom, harassing with arrows whilst screening their allies.

loading_screen_quotes.description: These archers take aim at the enemies of the Elven kingdom, harassing with arrows whilst screening their allies.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Ellyrian Reaver Archers

description.last_approved_text: Chariots are best employed to deliver destructive charges to the enemy lines - over and over again.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Chariots are best employed to deliver destructive charges to the enemy lines - over and over again.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Ithilmar Chariot

description.last_approved_text: The stuff of legend, devastating enemy lines with a staggering charge.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The stuff of legend, devastating enemy lines with a staggering charge.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Silver Helms

description.last_approved_text: With stout shields and resolute temperaments, resisting the charge of any who dare stand against them.

loading_screen_quotes.description: With stout shields and resolute temperaments, resisting the charge of any who dare stand against them.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Silver Helms (Shields)

description.last_approved_text: A thundering mix of beast and machine to harass enemy battlelines from range before crushing them at the charge.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A thundering mix of beast and machine to harass enemy battlelines from range before crushing them at the charge.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Tiranoc Chariot

description.last_approved_text: Teclis is Tyrion's twin brother, but two more different siblings would be hard to find. Where the curse of Aenarion has yet to leave an obvious mark upon Tyrion, it has made his brother frail and caustic.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Teclis is Tyrion's twin brother, but two more different siblings would be hard to find. Where the curse of Aenarion has yet to leave an obvious mark upon Tyrion, it has made his brother frail and caustic.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Teclis

description.last_approved_text: Prince Tyrion is the High Elves’ greatest living warrior. So valiant and skilled is he that the bards of Ulthuan sing that he is nothing less than Aenarion reborn - a tale that is given credence far beyond Ulthuan's shores.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Prince Tyrion is the High Elves’ greatest living warrior. So valiant and skilled is he that the bards of Ulthuan sing that he is nothing less than Aenarion reborn - a tale that is given credence far beyond Ulthuan's shores.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Tyrion

description.last_approved_text: The bow is as natural to the High Elves as breathing; each shot is a masterpiece of death from afar.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The bow is as natural to the High Elves as breathing; each shot is a masterpiece of death from afar.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Archers

description.last_approved_text: The bow is as natural to the High Elves as breathing; each shot is a masterpiece of death from afar.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The bow is as natural to the High Elves as breathing; each shot is a masterpiece of death from afar.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Archers (Light Armour)

description.last_approved_text: The Emerald Gate - one of the wonders of the Old World - is guarded only by the best of the best.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The Emerald Gate - one of the wonders of the Old World - is guarded only by the best of the best.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Gate Guard

description.last_approved_text: Unlike other levied citizen militias, the Lothern Sea Guard remain armed and ready at all times.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Unlike other levied citizen militias, the Lothern Sea Guard remain armed and ready at all times.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Lothern Sea Guard

description.last_approved_text: Unlike other levied citizen militias, the Lothern Sea Guard remain armed and ready at all times.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Unlike other levied citizen militias, the Lothern Sea Guard remain armed and ready at all times.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Lothern Sea Guard (Shields)

description.last_approved_text: At the heart of the battle, in the thickest fighting, highly-trained and utterly silent.

loading_screen_quotes.description: At the heart of the battle, in the thickest fighting, highly-trained and utterly silent.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Phoenix Guard

description.last_approved_text: All High Elves, both highborn and low, must defend Ulthuan to the last.

loading_screen_quotes.description: All High Elves, both highborn and low, must defend Ulthuan to the last.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Spearmen

description.last_approved_text: Hoeth-forged steel cries out as its wielders lunge into battle, cutting down foe after foe with their greatswords.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Hoeth-forged steel cries out as its wielders lunge into battle, cutting down foe after foe with their greatswords.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Swordmasters of Hoeth

description.last_approved_text: Charged to defend the Phoenix King to the last, they cut their opponents down with their savage great axes.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Charged to defend the Phoenix King to the last, they cut their opponents down with their savage great axes.
loading_screen_quotes.title: White Lions of Chrace

description.last_approved_text: Firm allies for millennia, these majestic birds aid the Elves by swooping onto enemy lines and clawing them apart.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Firm allies for millennia, these majestic birds aid the Elves by swooping onto enemy lines and clawing them apart.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Great Eagle

description.last_approved_text: Matured and wise, they savage enemy battlelines with claws and fearsome flames.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Matured and wise, they savage enemy battlelines with claws and fearsome flames.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Moon Dragon

description.last_approved_text: Pure airborne majesty, it brings fire and death as it swoops down over enemy lines.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Pure airborne majesty, it brings fire and death as it swoops down over enemy lines.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Flamespyre Phoenix

description.last_approved_text: The touch of an aged Phoenix is enough to freeze a warrior to death.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The touch of an aged Phoenix is enough to freeze a warrior to death.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Frostheart Phoenix

description.last_approved_text: The most ancient of Dragons, they destroy the foe with a power that can halt Chaos itself.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The most ancient of Dragons, they destroy the foe with a power that can halt Chaos itself.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Star Dragon

description.last_approved_text: Young and impetuous, these Dragons dive down onto enemy ranks with exuberant fury, crushing foes like flies.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Young and impetuous, these Dragons dive down onto enemy ranks with exuberant fury, crushing foes like flies.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Sun Dragon

description.last_approved_text: A pack of Cold Ones, ridden with skill, can charge powerfully into melee and remain there for some time.

loading_screen_quotes.description: A pack of Cold Ones, ridden with skill, can charge powerfully into melee and remain there for some time.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Cold One Spear-Riders

description.last_approved_text: Those able to ride Cold Ones charge headlong into enemy lines, thrashing with crude but effective clubs.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Those able to ride Cold Ones charge headlong into enemy lines, thrashing with crude but effective clubs.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Cold One Riders

description.last_approved_text: Untamed Cold Ones are far too unpredictable to be ridden into battle; simply point them at the foe and stay out of their way!

loading_screen_quotes.description: Untamed Cold Ones are far too unpredictable to be ridden into battle; simply point them at the foe and stay out of their way!
loading_screen_quotes.title: Feral Cold Ones

description.last_approved_text: Much rarer than other Cold Ones, these virtually-extinct Lustrian warriors fight with preternatural swiftness that belies their size.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Much rarer than other Cold Ones, these virtually-extinct Lustrian warriors fight with preternatural swiftness that belies their size.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Horned Ones

description.last_approved_text: These Lizardmen riders swoop down upon the enemy lines to harass them from above.

loading_screen_quotes.description: These Lizardmen riders swoop down upon the enemy lines to harass them from above.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Terradon Riders

description.last_approved_text: These Lizardmen riders swoop down upon the enemy lines to harass them from above.

loading_screen_quotes.description: These Lizardmen riders swoop down upon the enemy lines to harass them from above.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Terradon Riders (Fireleech Bolas)

description.last_approved_text: Kroq-Gar is an ancient Saurus, the last remaining warrior from the now ruined temple-city of Xhotl. The spawning that brought him into the world also produced a handful of other Saurus, each marked for greatness.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Kroq-Gar is an ancient Saurus, the last remaining warrior from the now ruined temple-city of Xhotl. The spawning that brought him into the world also produced a handful of other Saurus, each marked for greatness.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Kroq-Gar

description.last_approved_text: Lord Mazdamundi is the oldest and most powerful of the living Slann Mage-Priests. At the Dawn of Creation, he was instructed by none other than Lord Kroak himself.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Lord Mazdamundi is the oldest and most powerful of the living Slann Mage-Priests. At the Dawn of Creation, he was instructed by none other than Lord Kroak himself.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Lord Mazdamundi

description.last_approved_text: Unseen on the battlefield, but felt when their deadly darts bring down enemies in their droves.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Unseen on the battlefield, but felt when their deadly darts bring down enemies in their droves.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Chameleon Skinks

description.last_approved_text: The charge will fall upon them and be repelled by resolute hands bearing resolute polearms.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The charge will fall upon them and be repelled by resolute hands bearing resolute polearms.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Saurus Spears

description.last_approved_text: Watch as the foe throws itself upon these warriors' spears. Those who survive must then face shield and claw.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Watch as the foe throws itself upon these warriors' spears. Those who survive must then face shield and claw.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Saurus Spears (Shields)

description.last_approved_text: The standard, hardy warriors of the Lizardmen battleline. Their clubs are inelegant, but effective.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The standard, hardy warriors of the Lizardmen battleline. Their clubs are inelegant, but effective.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Saurus Warriors

description.last_approved_text: Holding the line against the enemy charge, braced with shields and fierce with primordial determination.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Holding the line against the enemy charge, braced with shields and fierce with primordial determination.

description.last_approved_text: Bolstering the fighting spirit of all those around it and blasting enemy ranks with savage, dark energy.

description.last_approved_text: Ariel's handmaidens know only the defence of their Queen and the forest - an eternal duty, never forsworn.

description.last_approved_text: A figure of awe and influence, the Fay Enchantress is the Lady’s personal representative and, some say, the true power in Bretonnia.

description.last_approved_text: The greatest Bretonnian leader since Gilles the Uniter, King Louen is a mighty warrior-king – the very pinnacle of Knightly perfection.

loading_screen_quotes.title: King Louen Leoncoeur

description.last_approved_text: Khazrak embodies the rage of the Beastmen. Hunger for war, for flesh and, most of all, for revenge drives his journey across the great blood-grounds, at the head of the brayherd.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Khazrak embodies the rage of the Beastmen. Hunger for war, for flesh and, most of all, for revenge drives his journey across the great blood-grounds, at the head of the brayherd.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Khazrak the One-Eye

description.last_approved_text: Malagor is swift, as if riding the very Winds of Magic. His every step and word boils with corruption, and the Bray-Shamans who serve him carry out their horrific work with increased fervour.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Malagor is swift, as if riding the very Winds of Magic. His every step and word boils with corruption, and the Bray-Shamans who serve him carry out their horrific work with increased fervour.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Malagor the Dark Omen

description.last_approved_text: The vile, twisted creature known as Morghur is the essence of mutation and corruption given form. His coarse hair is woven through with gibbering, shrieking skulls, and his form flows and reshapes with every passing second.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The vile, twisted creature known as Morghur is the essence of mutation and corruption given form. His coarse hair is woven through with gibbering, shrieking skulls, and his form flows and reshapes with every passing second.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Morghur the Shadowgave

description.last_approved_text: Archaon the Everchosen is the Lord of the End Times, the vessel through which the Dark Gods unite their followers and turn the whole world into a Realm of Chaos.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Archaon the Everchosen is the Lord of the End Times, the vessel through which the Dark Gods unite their followers and turn the whole world into a Realm of Chaos.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Archaon the Everchosen

description.last_approved_text: Kholek is a Shaggoth of tremendous age. He is one of the first-born kin of Krakanrok the Black, father of the Dragon Ogres. Where the Herald of the Tempest walks, a raging storm blots out the sun.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Kholek is a Shaggoth of tremendous age. He is one of the first-born kin of Krakanrok the Black, father of the Dragon Ogres. Where the Herald of the Tempest walks, a raging storm blots out the sun.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Kholek Suneater

description.last_approved_text: Though he appears to be little more than sixteen summers of age, Sigvald the Magnificent has blighted the world for over three hundred years; the personification of beauty on the outside, but rot within.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Though he appears to be little more than sixteen summers of age, Sigvald the Magnificent has blighted the world for over three hundred years; the personification of beauty on the outside, but rot within.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Prince Sigvald the Magnificent

description.last_approved_text: Before the loss of the Eight Peaks, Belegar’s Ancestors were the kings of the nigh-impregnable fortress for many generations. The Angrund Clan is steeped in centuries of military understanding and has a keen eye for the particulars of siege warfare.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Before the loss of the Eight Peaks, Belegar’s Ancestors were the kings of the nigh-impregnable fortress for many generations. The Angrund Clan is steeped in centuries of military understanding and has a keen eye for the particulars of siege warfare.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Belegar Ironhammer

description.last_approved_text: Grombrindal, The White Dwarf, is a legendary figure - the mightiest living Dawi warrior.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Grombrindal, The White Dwarf, is a legendary figure - the mightiest living Dawi warrior.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Grombrindal - The White Dwarf

description.last_approved_text: Thorgrim Grudgebearer is the current High King of the Dwarfs. He is a throwback to the High Kings of old - eager for new conquests, mighty in battle, and a merciless enemy.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Thorgrim Grudgebearer is the current High King of the Dwarfs. He is a throwback to the High Kings of old - eager for new conquests, mighty in battle, and a merciless enemy.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Thorgrim Grudgebearer

description.last_approved_text: There are few kinds of monsters walking the world that Ungrim Ironfist has not slain in battle. Ungrim deals death - carving a path of red ruin before him while singing songs of old in a booming voice.

loading_screen_quotes.description: There are few kinds of monsters walking the world that Ungrim Ironfist has not slain in battle. Ungrim deals death - carving a path of red ruin before him while singing songs of old in a booming voice.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Ungrim Ironfist

description.last_approved_text: Balthasar Gelt is the Supreme Patriarch of the Colleges of Magic. He has only ever been seen swathed in shimmering, metallic robes and wearing a golden mask.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Balthasar Gelt is the Supreme Patriarch of the Colleges of Magic. He has only ever been seen swathed in shimmering, metallic robes and wearing a golden mask.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Balthasar Gelt

description.last_approved_text: Like all Middenheimers and men of Ulric, Boris Todbringer never takes a challenge lightly, and so brought total war to the Beastmen and their leader, Khazrak the One Eye.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Like all Middenheimers and men of Ulric, Boris Todbringer never takes a challenge lightly, and so brought total war to the Beastmen and their leader, Khazrak the One Eye.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Boris Todbringer

description.last_approved_text: The newly-elected Emperor is Karl Franz, Prince of Altdorf and Elector Count of Reikland. Franz is already garnering a reputation as a great statesman and warrior but has yet to prove himself as sovereign.

loading_screen_quotes.description: The newly-elected Emperor is Karl Franz, Prince of Altdorf and Elector Count of Reikland. Franz is already garnering a reputation as a great statesman and warrior but has yet to prove himself as sovereign.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Karl Franz

description.last_approved_text: Volkmar the Grim is the head of the Cult of Sigmar and the most powerful religious leader in the Empire. He is a pious and foreboding man, utterly devoted to the destruction of Chaos in all its forms.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Volkmar the Grim is the head of the Cult of Sigmar and the most powerful religious leader in the Empire. He is a pious and foreboding man, utterly devoted to the destruction of Chaos in all its forms.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Volkmar the Grim

description.last_approved_text: Azhag is a threat like no other. What makes Azhag so unusual is his ominous iron crown, which emanates an ancient evil. It is this crown, a relic of olden days, which grants Azhag sorcerous powers.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Azhag is a threat like no other. What makes Azhag so unusual is his ominous iron crown, which emanates an ancient evil. It is this crown, a relic of olden days, which grants Azhag sorcerous powers.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Azhag the Slaughterer

description.last_approved_text: No one knows much about Grimgor before he staggered out of the Blasted Wastes with the Immortulz, his bloody-minded bodyguard. Even for a Black Orc, Grimgor's thirst for war is exceptional.

loading_screen_quotes.description: No one knows much about Grimgor before he staggered out of the Blasted Wastes with the Immortulz, his bloody-minded bodyguard. Even for a Black Orc, Grimgor's thirst for war is exceptional.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Grimgor Ironhide

description.last_approved_text: Skarsnik is a meddlesome and cunning Night Goblin, preferring to taunt and torment his opponents rather than swiftly killing them. Ever the sneakiest of his kind, he leads his forces on feints and duplicitous manoeuvres that leave his enemies bewildered, beleaguered, and - eventually - destroyed.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Skarsnik is a meddlesome and cunning Night Goblin, preferring to taunt and torment his opponents rather than swiftly killing them. Ever the sneakiest of his kind, he leads his forces on feints and duplicitous manoeuvres that leave his enemies bewildered, beleaguered, and - eventually - destroyed.
loading_screen_quotes.title: Skarsnik

description.last_approved_text: Wurrzag’s power and influence are beyond question. Those that know his abilities obey; those who do not, suffer. His retinue of Savage Orcs has vowed to stand by ‘Da Great Green Prophet’ to the end, and their strength has inspired countless other Greenskins to war in their turn.

loading_screen_quotes.description: Wurrzag’s power and influence are beyond question. Those that know his abilities obey; those who do not, suffer. description.last_approved_text: Vlad von Carstein is the first and greatest of the Vampire Counts of Sylvania. A master swordsman and skilled general with no small aptitude in the magical arts.

description.last_approved_text: Durthu is an Elder of Athel Loren, a Treeman so ancient that even Ariel's millenia-long existence pales in comparison. It was he who first forged a union between Elves and forest, and he also who argued with his fellow Elders that the binding be made permanent.

description.last_approved_text: Orion is the King of Athel Loren and consort of the Mage Queen, Ariel. Although all Elves are long-lived, he is immortal - calling the Wild Hunt each year in defence of the sacred forest.
